channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- PeopleSoft Enterprise FIN Payables
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- PeopleSoft Enterprise FIN Payables

item.title: CVE-2021-2044|2024-08-03T16:32:01.713Z -- oracle%20corporation -- peoplesoft%20enterprise%20fin%20payables
item.description: Vulnerability in the PeopleSoft Enterprise FIN Payables product of Oracle PeopleSoft (component: Financial Sanctions). The supported version that is affected is 9.2. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise PeopleSoft Enterprise FIN Payables. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized access to critical data or complete access to all PeopleSoft Enterprise FIN Payables accessible data. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 6.5 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N).
